text: Updated 2025 Quinteros Preoperative Simulation Nurse Content Review the following prior to your preoperative simulation: • Read chapter 28 pages 680-681 on Appendicitis in your Introduction to Maternity and Pediatric Nursing book. • Review and be familiar with the client’s chart in ChartFlow, Preoperative check off sheet, and Preoperative ChartFlow charting rubric in D2L. • View the Alaris pump programming, primary and piggyback IV infusion video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hT_KRyXqS8s • Review IV insertion and medication administration skills. • Complete the Pediatric Preoperative Medication Worksheet and submit it via Dropbox on D2L by 7:00 am the morning of your scheduled preoperative simulation. • There is no video for this simulation. You will need to obtain vital signs, start an IV, and give required medications. Follow your preoperative check off sheet. The following should be completed after you have completed your preoperative simulation: • Preoperative Sim ChartFlow charting • Preoperative Sim quiz These are both due by 7:00 pm on the day of your scheduled preoperative simulation.
